question: Which among the following is not a type of interactions in e-Governance explained by the Second Administrative Reforms Commission in its report entitled “Promoting e-Governance: The SMART Way Forward” (2008)?
explanation:
There are types of interactions in e-Governance explained by the Second Administrative Reforms Commission in its report entitled “Promoting e Governance: The SMART Way Forward” (2008) which are as follows-
1. G2C (Government to Citizens)
2. G2B (Government to Business)
3. G2G (Government to Government)
4. G2E (Government to Employees)
